channel.title: Homepage on Michael Wong
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on Michael Wong

item.description: I will join HKU this fall as an assistant professor of economics, with a joint appointment in management and strategy. My research covers labor economics, public economics, household finance, and monetary economics. Here is my CV. You can reach me at mbwong@mit.edu, or DM me on Twitter or Wechat. I will be hiring RAs soon (full-time or part-time). Please email me if interested!
